mapper.select: select t.* from (select IF((ISNULL(#{lat}) || LENGTH(trim(#{lat}))<1 || ISNULL(login_lat) || LENGTH(trim(login_lat))<1), 1000000, ROUND( 6378.137 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW(SIN((#{lat} * PI() / 180 - login_lat * PI() / 180) / 2), 2) + COS(#{lat} * PI() / 180) * COS(login_lat * PI() / 180) * POW(SIN((#{lon} * PI() / 180 - login_long * PI() / 180) / 2),2) ) ), 2) ) AS nearbyDistance, profile.user_name as nearbyUserName, profile.user_portrait as nearbyPortrait, profile.user_id as nearbyId, profile.user_bio as nearbyUserBio from t_user_login_info login,t_user_profile profile where login.login_user_id=profile.user_id) t where nearbyDistance<#{limitDistance} order by nearbyDistance
